location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Samuel Manesty, Resident at Bussora [Basra], Writing from Maghil, to Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun, Native Resident, Bushire

mods.abstract: Samuel Manesty, Resident at Bussora [Basra], writes that since closing the accompanying dispatch (see f 21v 1) he has received a letter from Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun [Mirza Mahdi 'Ali Khan Bahadur], Native Resident at Bushire, dated 20 October 1802, which gives the account of the last sales of woollens at Bushire. Manesty also acknowledges the receipt of information regarding the return of Major John Malcom [Malcolm] to Persia.
